thread.title: Stephanie Azzinari
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by Stephanie Azzinari

author: Stephanie Azzinari
title: Stephanie Azzinari
text: First off I'm not going to use my ticket until August so I won't really know if this site is hassle free until I board my plane. However, the booking process was so simple. Alister was my agent. I was very picky on my times and flights. He never gave up on me and worked with me, sending me flights until there was a combination that worked for me at an amazing price! Even after I paid he still didn't disappear. He was right there available to answer all my questions by email or phone call. Very prompt response. So far so good and I'm very happy with the customer service. Great company!
